name: Tinkaton
flavorText: This intelligent Pokémon has a very daring disposition. It knocks rocks into the sky with its hammer, aiming for flying Corviknight.

previous.name: Tinkatuff
previous.flavorText: This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawniard and Bisharp, gathering metal from them in order to create a large and sturdy hammer.

next.name: Wiglett
next.flavorText: This Pokémon can pick up the scent of a Veluza just over 65 feet away and will hide itself in the sand.

pokemon.name: Tinkatink
pokemon.flavorText: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon that eat metal.

pokemon.name: Tinkatuff
pokemon.flavorText: This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawniard and Bisharp, gathering metal from them in order to create a large and sturdy hammer.
